name: Red Attack!
description:
My first ever game. (on unity) 

Hello! This game is basically just a test for future games I will make to see how things work. You have to dodge these red spike creatures forever until you die. You have a score, and a highscore meter. I may add a shop later that you can buy stuff with your highscore.

I will try to get this game on different platforms like getting it to run on this website to test how that works too.

--------------- MUSIC--------------

Ingame Music: Cut and Run by Kevin Macleod

Lobby Music: Kool Kats by Kevin Macleod

------CHANGELOG-------
